meanings.definition: A type of marine mollusk with a conical shell.
meanings.sent1: The limpets clung tightly to the rocks by the shore.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study limpets to learn more about marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The limpets had a family reunion on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: The limpets' shells were like tiny hats protecting them from the waves.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch the limpets crawl slowly along the rocks.

meanings.definition: A small, sturdy adhesive disk used to attach objects to a surface.
meanings.sent1: She used a limpets to stick the drawing to the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The limpets kept the poster securely in place on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The limpets on the back of the phone made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent4: His invention was inspired by the limpets' strong grip.
meanings.sent5: The limpets on the bottom of the toy car helped it climb up the wall.
